original_text: “Persia and Lud and Put were in your army as your men of war. They hung the shield and helmet in you; they gave you splendor.
korean_text: 바사와 룻과 붓이 네 군대 가운데에서 병정이 되었음이여 네 가운데에서 방패와 투구를 달아 네 영광을 나타냈도다

sentences.original_text: Persia and Lud and Put were in your army
sentences.korean_translation: 바사와 루드와 붓은 네 군대에 있었다

sentences.original_text: They hung the shield and helmet in you
